title: Adjust game card pricing display to medium size

requirements.summary: Modify the price display in GameCard component to use medium sizing while keeping it positioned in the top right corner below the sale label
acceptanceCriteria: Price text is visually balanced - larger than small text but not oversized
Price remains in top right corner position
Price stays below the sale label when both are present

file_operations.description: Adjust the price display text size to medium by modifying the className on the price element. Change from current sizing to text-lg or text-xl (medium range) while maintaining absolute positioning in top right corner below the sale label. Keep the existing color scheme, WhatsApp symbol, horizontal scrolling functionality, and sale label positioning unchanged.
